author: Home Repair Tutor
description:
Custom shower curb tips…I cut this prefab Schluter curb to the height I need. Even though I use a circular saw, a utility would work as well. This curb will support any glass shower door. And it can be cut to custom widths. Many thanks to Schluter for providing the materials for this project 🔥#showerrenovation #homerepairtutor #diy
#brandpartner
title: Custom Shower Curb Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
